about_the_game:
This is free demo to try out Last Drop game.

Last Drop is a third person adventure game in open world.

Follow the Story of Seppo with movie style cutscenes.

This game takes you to Finland 1994.

Action packed Open World game with some RPG-Elements.

Stats you can upgrade  (HP, XP, Levels, Power, Speed, Stamina, drunkennes, money, inventory, cars)

Fight mode like fighting games.

You can buy and drive cars, ride bikes, work, Drink...

Crazy story is inspired by life and true locations.

Day cycle and clock that affects shops etc.

Weather system.

content_descriptors.notes: You can drink alcohol in the game.

short_description: Last Drop is a story you need to experience. Welcome to Nykylä Finland 1994. Seppo Sahtivaara and friends are waiting for you. This is an openworld action game with a story that has an impact. We bring back old good games and action from the best movies from that era. We want you to enjoy!
